data.lyric:
[ti:GIANTS (2019英雄联盟真实伤害/True Damage《巨人 (GIANTS)》)]
[ar:英雄联盟/True Damage/Becky G/Keke Palmer/DUCKWRTH/Thutmose/田小娟 (전소연)]
[al:GIANTS]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]GIANTS - 英雄联盟 (League of Legends)/Becky G/Keke Palmer (柯克·帕尔莫)/田小娟 (전소연)/DUCKWRTH/Thutmose
[00:01.28]Lyrics by：Riot Music Team/Harloe/DUCKWRTH/Thutmose
[00:02.57]Composed by：Riot Music Team/Harloe/DUCKWRTH/Thutmose
[00:03.86]원하는 게 얼굴에 보여
[00:04.92]I'm trouble and you're wa-wa-wanting it
[00:08.10]Yeah yeah
[00:10.50]
[00:13.43]Moving too fast life is moving in slow-mo
[00:14.99]I'm a god better ask if you don't know
[00:16.70]Homie better put your pride aside
[00:18.13]I'm a Benz and you're more like a Volvo
[00:19.72]Your best stuff looks like my worst synapses fire and burst
[00:23.00]Got the whole crew with me 'bout to deal damage you know we ain't average
[00:25.63]I ain't gonna say this again but this is my time better look in my eyes
[00:28.27]I'm a genius in disguise wear my heart on my sleeve
[00:29.95]And you forced to oblige to a king in his Prime
[00:32.10]Everybody get in Line
[00:33.27]Sit back watch the stars Align
[00:34.84]I finesse like my life on the Line
[00:36.01]Was a diamond in the rough and now I Shine
[00:38.17]Ay no one can stop us they'll try but they won't
[00:44.21]Ay nada nos puede parar oh no
[00:49.51]We're wide awake now our eyes are wide open
[00:52.59]We're running this world we keeping it turning
[00:55.67]We're living like Giants
[00:57.69]Yea Giants
[00:58.85]We're bigger than Giants
[01:00.58]We Giants
[01:01.88]Oh oh oh oh
[01:03.07]Sleeping Giants sleeping sleeping Giants
[01:06.23]Shutting it down been underground now my people all up in this place
[01:09.34]Spinning this thing gold on my ring royalty up in my veins
[01:12.08]I'm loco think I'm so cold I stay stunting ain't no goin' back
[01:15.35]Now they ask where QiQi's at I'm like you can't hang with that
[01:18.35]쏟아져 빛이 멀게 돼 눈이
[01:19.79]멈추진 않아 once we go
[01:21.31]날카로운 날로 뭐든 베어
[01:22.95]빨리 달려 넌 못.따.라. 와
[01:24.83]True Damage we do it
[01:25.86]True Damage 보여줄게 뭐든 쉽게
[01:27.87]이기든지든 My crew make the beat drop
[01:30.76]Ay no one can stop us they'll try but they won't
[01:36.90]Ay nada nos puede parar oh no
[01:42.23]We're wide awake now our eyes are wide open
[01:45.37]We're running this world we keeping it turning
[01:48.39]We're living like Giants
[01:50.30]Yea Giants
[01:51.50]We're bigger than Giants
[01:53.19]We Giants
[01:54.55]Ya thought that we were weak but we coming right back
[01:57.65]This time ya gonna see how we do it like that
[02:00.60]We're living like Giants
[02:02.69]Yea Giants
[02:03.95]We're bigger than Giants
[02:05.76]We Giants
[02:06.89]Oh oh oh oh
[02:08.11]Sleeping Giants sleeping sleeping Giants
[02:13.26]I keep on shattering time
[02:14.87]I might just leave you behind
[02:16.65]Homie you stuck on rewind
[02:20.12]You should quit sleeping on mines you got your back on recline
[02:23.03]When I damage your delicate spine
[02:24.73]Please don't act all shy and surprised
[02:26.89]They be like
[02:27.37]Ay
[02:27.76]They be like
[02:28.15]What you mean what is your winning scheme
[02:31.20]I got a giant team big as my self-esteem
[02:34.12]Run it back run it back running man
[02:35.56]They think they go hard I'm like come again
[02:37.45]You run out of time when I'm bustin' in
[02:38.98]While you stumbling I got this blade in my hand for your punishment
[02:42.54]We're wide awake now our eyes are wide open
[02:45.54]We're running this world we keeping it turning
[02:48.72]We're living like Giants
[02:50.35]Yea Giants
[02:51.67]We're bigger than Giants
[02:53.42]We Giants
[02:54.84]Ya thought that we were weak but we coming right back
[02:57.81]This time ya gonna see how we do it like that
[03:00.85]We're living like Giants
[03:03.01]Yea Giants
[03:04.18]We're bigger than Giants
[03:05.85]We Giants
[03:07.23]Oh oh oh oh
[03:08.44]Sleeping Giants sleeping sleeping GIANTS
data.trans:
[ti:GIANTS (2019英雄联盟真实伤害/True Damage《巨人 (GIANTS)》)]
[ar:英雄联盟/True Damage/Becky G/Keke Palmer/DUCKWRTH/Thutmose/田小娟 (전소연)]
[al:GIANTS]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.28]//
[00:02.57]//
[00:03.86]心中渴望都写在脸上
[00:04.92]我可不好惹 你们心悦诚服
[00:08.10]//
[00:10.50]
[00:13.43]电光石火 一切在我眼前慢放
[00:14.99]不假思索 谁又比谁更加狂妄
[00:16.70]别和我摆出自视甚高的嘴脸
[00:18.13]乖乖看好我的奔驰跨越天险
[00:19.72]你的杰作只是我的草稿 火力一开就要烧穿大脑
[00:23.00]所有人跟我一起 这致命的一击 非同一般的奇袭
[00:25.63]我不想反复再说 但现在是我在说 看好我的眼睛
[00:28.27]伪装之下的灵性 坦荡的表情 
[00:29.95]看见的人都要臣服
[00:32.10]听我命令的队伍
[00:33.27]乖乖站好 看巨星闪耀
[00:34.84]千磨万砺 殚精竭虑
[00:36.01]光芒终将四射的一块璞玉
[00:38.17]谁也无法阻挡 庸人无谓地抵抗
[00:44.21]无法抗拒的音浪
[00:49.51]觉醒的心 万物看尽
[00:52.59]世界俯首帖耳 洗耳恭听
[00:55.67]我们就是巨人
[00:57.69]没错 巨人
[00:58.85]站在肩上的巨人
[01:00.58]我们就是巨人
[01:01.88]//
[01:03.07]沉睡的巨人 沉醉的灵魂
[01:06.23]饱受打击 来自地底 我的同类已经全面占领
[01:09.34]巨轮转动不停 手上的黄金 血里的天命
[01:12.08]你们以为我是冷血的狂人 我却一往无前 无所畏惧的灵魂
[01:15.35]人们还在张望 我已一骑绝尘 他们愣在原地 徒劳追问
[01:18.35]夺目的光从天而降
[01:19.79]一旦出发就不会停下
[01:21.31]犀利的声音步步紧逼
[01:22.95]不堪的人就要落荒而逃
[01:24.83]我们带来真实的伤害
[01:25.86]无人幸免的真实伤害
[01:27.87]得失都好 让音乐响起
[01:30.76]谁也无法阻挡 庸人无谓地抵抗
[01:36.90]无法抗拒的音浪
[01:42.23]觉醒的心 万物看尽
[01:45.37]世界俯首帖耳 洗耳恭听
[01:48.39]我们就是巨人
[01:50.30]没错 巨人
[01:51.50]站在肩上的巨人
[01:53.19]我们就是巨人
[01:54.55]错把我们当做弱者的人 看我们再次启程
[01:57.65]这时代的巨人 已经撞进你的大门
[02:00.60]我们就是巨人
[02:02.69]没错 巨人
[02:03.95]站在肩上的巨人
[02:05.76]我们就是巨人
[02:06.89]//
[02:08.11]沉睡的巨人 沉醉的灵魂
[02:13.26]打破时间的我
[02:14.87]是你追不上的火
[02:16.65]看着你不停地反复重播
[02:20.12]睡不着的人很生气 真实的伤害要全体起立
[02:23.03]站不直的人请坐进扶手椅
[02:24.73]噘着嘴黑着脸说你玩不起
[02:26.89]他们说
[02:27.37]//
[02:27.76]他们说
[02:28.15]你有什么打算 想赢的人该怎么办
[02:31.20]我的巨人已经成群结伴 我随时随地自命不凡
[02:34.12]往后退 往后退 往后退
[02:35.56]他们自以为是 我说你也配
[02:37.45]你们时辰已到 可我还不嫌累
[02:38.98]你跌跌撞撞 撞上我的刀口 送上你的人头
[02:42.54]觉醒的心 万物看尽
[02:45.54]世界俯首帖耳 洗耳恭听
[02:48.72]我们就是巨人
[02:50.35]没错 巨人
[02:51.67]站在肩上的巨人
[02:53.42]我们就是巨人
[02:54.84]错把我们当做弱者的人 看我们再次启程
[02:57.81]这时代的巨人 已经撞进你的大门
[03:00.85]我们就是巨人
[03:03.01]没错 巨人
[03:04.18]站在肩上的巨人
[03:05.85]我们就是巨人
[03:07.23]//
[03:08.44]沉睡的巨人 沉醉的灵魂
